title: [FEATURE] SKLottieImageSource fromFile method is internal
body: `SKLottieImageSource` fromFile method is internal. Meaning you cant set the source from C# code

comments.author: thomaskaelin
comments.body:
I noticed this issue as well while porting an existing Xamarin.Forms-app to .NET MAUI.

@IeuanWalker Did you find any workarounds for this?

comments.author: IeuanWalker
comments.body: @thomaskaelin no sorry, havnt worked on it since i found this issues

comments.author: JaHdz
thomaskaelin
comments.body: @JaHdz Thanks a lot for the tip. I wasn't aware of `SKFileLottieImageSource`. I will give it a try. 👍

comments.body: Thanks. At the time I was unsure, so I made it all internal. I have a PR to clean this up.
